about_the_game: Adult-only DLC removes censorship in the game. Nudity appears. There are various sex toys like rockets, penis-saws, penis-spikes. Dialogues are becoming tougher (drugs, rough sex, sexual harassment, hints of various BDSM practices.), new options appear and one ending that had to be cut in the regular version. Also, instead of shooting at the shooting range when choosing the appropriate remark in the dialogue with the girl, your reprimand will go to have sex with her. Adult content, not intended for viewing at work, all heroes over 18 years old. Also blood, violence and murder. Profanity.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains sexual content and nudity. As well as hints of various BDSM practices. The dialogues touch on topics of sexual harassment, drug use and rough sex. Profanity. Alcohol and tobacco use. Adult content, not intended for viewing at work, all heroes over 18 years old. Also blood, violence and murder.

detailed_description: Adult-only DLC removes censorship in the game. Nudity appears. There are various sex toys like rockets, penis-saws, penis-spikes. Dialogues are becoming tougher (drugs, rough sex, sexual harassment, hints of various BDSM practices.), new options appear and one ending that had to be cut in the regular version. Also, instead of shooting at the shooting range when choosing the appropriate remark in the dialogue with the girl, your reprimand will go to have sex with her. Adult content, not intended for viewing at work, all heroes over 18 years old. Also blood, violence and murder. Profanity.
name: BDSM: Big Drunk Satanic Massacre. Adult Only

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64 Bit Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel® Core™ i5-750 or 3.2 GHz AMD Phenom™ II X4 955
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD5850
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64 Bit Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-6350 (6 3900) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 (2048 MB) / Radeon HD 7970 (3072 MB)
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible soundcard
